description: This source file defines a Flutter widget called TopBar, which is a custom stateless widget implementing PreferredSizeWidget. It creates a styled top app bar with a title, optional actions, and a user avatar, used for providing consistent header UI across the app.

classes.name: TopBar
classes.description: A lightweight, style-guide aligned top app bar with optional actions, routing user interactions and displaying title and user info.

methods.name: TopBar
methods.description: Constructor for TopBar widget, with optional title and actions.

methods.name: preferredSize
methods.description: Getter that returns the preferred height size of the AppBar (56 pixels).

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method that renders the widget tree for the top bar UI, including title, 'Beta' badge, actions, and user avatar.
